ygData.subject: The Infecticons revealed
ygData.msgSnippet: In the far future... a planet orbits the chunks of a dead sun, however, this is no ordinary planet, because around it orbits a massive moon about 3/4s the size
ygData.rawEmail:
Return-Path: <LegendaryNemasis@...>
X-Sender: LegendaryNemasis@...
X-Apparently-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Received: (EGP: mail-7_1_3); 30 May 2001 23:00:04 -0000
Received: (qmail 93165 invoked from network); 30 May 2001 23:00:03 -0000
Received: from unknown (10.1.10.142) by m8.onelist.org with QMQP; 30 May 2001 23:00:03 -0000
Received: from unknown (HELO imo-r03.mx.aol.com) (152.163.225.99) by mta3 with SMTP; 30 May 2001 23:00:03 -0000
Received: from LegendaryNemasis@... by imo-r03.mx.aol.com (mail_out_v30.22.) id r.a.d8b5a47 (18410) for <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>; Wed, 30 May 2001 18:59:59 -0400 (EDT)
Message-ID: <a.d8b5a47.2846d56f@...>
Date: Wed, 30 May 2001 18:59:59 EDT
Subject: The Infecticons revealed
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="part1_a.d8b5a47.2846d56f_boundary"
X-Mailer: AOL 6.0 for Windows US sub 10513
From: Legendarynemasis@...


--part1_a.d8b5a47.2846d56f_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

In the far future... a planet orbits the chunks of a dead sun, however, this 
is no ordinary planet, because around it orbits a massive moon about 3/4s the 
size of the planet. It is on this moon that the Infecticons, the race that 
have invaded the Cybertronian galaxy in the Vile Force's future, that the 
Infecticon's evil master reigns. All around and even below their master 
lurks, few Infecticons ever visiting the moon. In orbit around the moon is a 
mother ship for the Infecticons having their second in command and a group of 
high ranking Infecticon council members sit at a table with a 3D Hologram of 
the moon hovering above the table. each of the Infecticons are shrouded in 
dark cloaks, the room also dark with no lights except for the glows of the 
faces of the Infecticons, who are not robots... but are actually beings made 
of energy. Soon the second in command of the Infecticon army stands in front 
of the council members and the 3D image of the moon.

Diablos: "I shall call this meeting to order now.... During our invasion of 
the Cybertronian solar system we intercepted a transmission from one of the 
space stations to a location yet unknown. In the transmission one of the life 
forms ordered a secret base to prepare its transwarp warpgate to send a group 
of their men back in time to the past to prevent this future."

All members of the council grumble and growl as one of them slams their fist 
into the table.

Demonite: "We can't allow them to alter our future. Cybertron will be ours as 
it was destined to be!"

Just then the room and the entire ship shakes as the moon the ship is 
orbiting rotates to what appears a massive crack in the moons surface, soon 
afterwards the crack opens a bit spilling a massive red light onto the 
Infecticon mothership. Inside the Mothership itself all Infecticon troops and 
civilians stop as do the people on the Infecticon planet as they look up at 
the massive red light. Soon all of them listen to the words of their master, 
which is actually the moon itself.

The Bamphomet(the moon): "Eons ago... when the great war broke out between 
the Autobots and Decepticons... A large group of Autobots and Decepticons 
left the world on a ship to avoid the conflict... They did not wish to 
partake in the fighting and set off to find a world at peace. They visited 
countless worlds, each war torn and showed no signs of ending their wars. 
Finally they arrived here.. at system void... It is here that they found the 
peace they sought... a world whose bueaty rivaled that of a thousand jungle 
worlds... The system unknown to them at that time was also filled with a 
sepcial energy that was being emitted from a dimension other then the pit... 
or the Matrix... the power enfused with their sparks and soon changed it to 
that of the new energy. The power made them stronger, Faster, smarter then 
they thought possible. When they discoveded this they realized that this 
discovery would lead to a war between themselves out of greed... out of 
fear... and out of hate... and thus the Autobots and Decepticons sacrificed 
themselves... mind... body... spark... and merged with each other into one 
single concious being... in doing this... they created a direct portal to the 
dimension from which they drew their power from and with it they created a 
race of beings to help the new being in their quest to bring peace to the 
Universe... that being that was created was I. The beings that I created were 
you... and for Eons you have been my instruments of peace... and that peace 
shall come by destroying all weapons that cause war... Which is sentience 
itself... Only when all sentience has been rid of the universe can the peace 
we strive for be achieved... We have already eliminated countless races and 
have assimilated them into myself... including their worlds... mind... body.. 
and spark... these Cybertronians in our present seem to be bent on resisting 
us... therefore, like them... we shall send our own men to the past and 
eliminate their men... and all other Maximal and Predacons on the planet. Our 
time must not be altered. If it is it may compromise our mission. Begin 
construction of a home for the team of men that I shall create... Begin your 
work now and don't dwell on individual thoughts any longer... we must not 
stray from out path of peace. Go... now... and prepare..."

With that the crack in the moon closes and it rotates away from the ship and 
the planet. Everyone inside the ships chamber  remain silent before they look 
to te second in command who presses a button on the table.

Diablos: "Captain, take us down back to the planet. We have our orders."

--part1_a.d8b5a47.2846d56f_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
